entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet command hangs on two out of three Linux systems (possible deadlock) #98270
  • Document how a source language can support tree-shaking-friendly FFI #98265
  • Linq `CountBy` and `AggregateBy` don't preserve order #98259
  • Linker doesn't use correct TypeDefinition to determine if a method is needed as an override of an interface method #98255
  • [API Proposal]: Extend IDistributedCache to also provide keys/provider info #98252
  • [API Proposal]: Extend IMemoryCache to also provide keys/provider info #98251

Closed

  • double.Cos and double.SinCos can produce very different results #98204
  • NativeAOT result binary on macOS targets latest SDK #98124
  • Collapse/remove projects under src/installer/tests/Assets/TestProjects #77807
    9.0.0
  • ILLink doesn't keep static default interface method for uninstantiated types #96854
    9.0.0
  • ILLink doesn't keep most specific static default interface method #96855
    9.0.0
  • Mariner 1 and Mariner 2 runtime-deps rpm package dependencies (x86_64 and aarch64) need to include ca-certificates #96874

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Add missing test case for BitCast (#97983)" #98272
    needs-area-label
  • Fix failing BitCast test #98271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98269
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98268
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98267
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix URL encoding of HttpUtility.ParseQueryString's ToString method #98263
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Update where and when vzeroupper is emitted #98261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove SharedFramework test helper in host tests in favor of TestArtifact #98260
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #98256
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Send assembly_load events while invoking methods using debugger-libs #98254
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Send assembly_load events while invoking methods using debugger-libs #98253
    area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • Workaround an MSVC bug with __libm_sse2_sincos_ #98207
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][jit] Simplify method_needs_stack_walk (). #98230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Pass the minimum macOS version to the linker #98233
    os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix macOS checked build of NativeAOT #98266
    os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: More CSE heuristics adjustments #98257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98239
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the various `Max*Number` and `Min*Number` APIs optimize correctly #98159
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98066
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • Add missing test case for BitCast #97983
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove CoreCLR math.h CRT PAL Redefines #98048
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Sin/Cos #98194
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove C-String PAL wrappers #98189
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: Add FlowEdge destination block member #98243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GP_3A` to `SVE_HV_4A` #98141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Don't use IEnumerable and yield return for GetDefaultInterfaceImplementations #98183
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update lead owner of compression #97328
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove C FILE PAL wrappers #98238
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix constant folding for arm64 MultiplyByScalar operations involving Vector2.One #98150
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #97738
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fast FieldInfo reflection #98199
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FK_3{A,B,C}, EJ_3A, EK_3A, EY_3B, EW_3{A,B} #98187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • This is an incomplete implementation of a new randomized allocation s… #98167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Reduce locking around TypeVarTypeDesc creation #97531
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix polluted CompareState when comparing element types in a signature #98249
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FR_2A, GB_2A, FV_2A, FY_3A #98248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Fix gc-related bugs in risc-v emitter #98226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Struct Lambdas #1060
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Champion "Extension function members" #192
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set
  • Open issue: relax requirement that type be enumerable to participate in collection expressions #7744

PullRequests

Created

  • Update params-collections.md based on recent LDM decisions #7930
  • Add description of extension interface implementation #7928

Merged

  • Update breaking-change-warnings.md #7924

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unnecessary defensive copies in `string` + implicit `object` operator #72044
  • `GetRelativePath` in `PathUtilities` crashes with IndexOutOfRangeException #72043

Closed

  • Regular occurrence of `ReplaceMethodWithPropertyCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72035
  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpConvertToRecordRefactoringProvider` error #72032
  • While "Rename symbol’s file" is enabled, renaming class fails when using `TargetFrameworks` with at least two target frameworks #65731
    17.8 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove "is final document state" from compilation trackers. #72045
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into ParamsCollections #72042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Break a cycle through attributes #72041
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Remove -windows TFM being used in MSBuild tests #72040
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix crash in 'convert interface impl to implicit/explicit'. #72027
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'replace method with property' when references are in generated parts. #72039
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash with convert to record #72037
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add argument check to help track down a crash #72038
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove the AllSyntaxTreesParsed compilation tracker state. #72021
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactor where we do project type detection and sending telemetry #71969
    Area-IDE
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plainTextSansFilter #53939
  • Missing TimeProvider implementation for Identity #53938
  • Razor StreamRendering bug with server side project #53936
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mapaction #53934
  • High memory usage on an idle web app #53933
  • 🎉 Welcoming @Andrzej-W as a New Community Triager! 🎉 #53932
    Discussions

Closed

  • Perf improvement: mvc #53911
  • Perf regression: plaintext #53913
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext #53935
  • Can I use the new razor Identity UI from .NET8 in Blazor Server Side? #53893
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53927
  • a second operation was started on this context #53910

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53929
    area-blazor

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix hot reload memory leak #53928
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • PathString.StartsWithSegments: Clarify trailing slash behavior in doc comments #53924
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interop registered singleton cant be used in Blazor Hybrid #20499

    .NET 8 SR3
  • Set Focus to a DatePicker scroll the view to bottom on iOS #20494
  • [iOS] OrientationStateTrigger does not detect orientation state changes on iPad (works on iPhone) #20491
  • Optimizing Assemblies for size limit #20490
  • Windows: Switch shows On/OffContent text #20486

Closed

  • APT2000 - I can't create any new project #19324
  • Android: Binding does not work when view is hidden #10109
    Backlog
  • Back button not visible on Android in .net 8 #20480
  • StackLayout/Grid adds extra padding when there's a Border inside #19958

PullRequests

Created

  • [testing] Fix snapshots ios17 #20500
  • Add '#' to trigger UrlEncoding on Android PhoneDialer #20498
    community ✨
  • [iOS] NullReferenceException for Span GridItemsLayout fix #20492
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    community ✨
  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    community ✨
  • UI Test logs still aren't pushing to CI #20485

Merged

  • [testing] Fix more iOS17 test #20493
  • Adding a test to validate loading images #20147
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR3
  • [ci] Fix CarouseltestPostion test for iOS17 #20489
    testing-green-ci
  • Gather iOS device logs after running tests #20458

Updated

  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • RadioButton being Garbage Collected #20472
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Inheriting Visual States #20467
    community ✨
  • [Trimming] Add new API to create TypedBindings from expression #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Add support for relative binding sources to TypedBinding #20415
    area/Xaml </>
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 SR3
  • Appshell item template #18615
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, stale

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [SqlClient] Update 8.0 to 5.1.5 #33010
    7.0.x
  • Read Description String Into Generated Xml Comments When Scaffolding MS SQL Database #33051
  • Perf bottleneck because of SortedDictionary in Annotatable.FindAnnotation #25488
    9.0.0-preview1

Updated

  • Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complex types with TPH entities #33004
    8.0.x
  • `Select` projection with an (uncorrelated) subquery produces two separate SQL queries #33012
    9.0.0
  • Ephemeral/Shadow navigation properties or other mechanism of automatic joins. #32658
  • Complex type comparison to inline instance doesn't work if some properties aren't listed inline #32988
  • Returning `SqlFragmentExpression` from `HasTranslation` doesn't work (switches to client evaluation) #32969
  • Cosmos: Narrow gap between EF and SDK LINQ provider #25764
  • Scaffolding doesn't work with the latest version of Mono.TextTemplating #32385
    9.0.0-preview2
  • ArgumentException thrown when building queries involving owned entities mapped with .ToJson() #33046
  • Use inheritance instead of annotations for TableExpressionBase (specifically temporal tables) #33044
  • Deliver highly-requested user features for EF Core #24107
    Backlog
  • Improvements to model building and conventions #22952
    Backlog
  • Improve experience deploying databases created by Migrations #19587
    Backlog
  • EF Core database provider for Azure Cosmos DB #33033
  • Enable more value object scenarios #31238
    Backlog
  • Revisit tools architecture #18840
    Backlog
  • The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #32972
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #33004 - Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complextypes with TPH entities #33054
    Servicing-consider
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have Type/type mapping #33053
  • [TEST ONLY] moving tests for #32972 to relational so we also test SqLite #33050
    auto-merge
  • Add OptimizeContext MSBuild target #33049
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33048
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Fix to #33004 - Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complex types with TPH entities #33052
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33047
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33039
